name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kenta - Quickly Share Bookmarks With Anyone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share your bookmarks with anyone in just a few clicks, recipients don't need the extension to access. Whenever you make changes to a shared bookmark folder, these changes are instantly viewable by every recipient.
